title: Tranquility in a wilderness: gardens of early Australia
creator_contributor_role: Australian Gallery Directors Council, production company

description: This film serves to explain the history, character and purpose of gardens during the initial 125 years of European settlement in Australia and to encourage their preservation as an integral part of our national heritage.
